#?????????_????_20????? #??20 #??????? HELICOPTER "CARNAGE" ABOUT 132 COMBAT LAUNCHES AND SECRETS OF ACHIEVEMENT ???????????? "Tomorrow is the last flight in the ranks of the Air Force... And that's all - I'm a free bird", - thought helicopter pilot Mykhailo "Carnage" on February 23, 22. It's not that he didn't like the service. He certainly didn?t get to be ?sad? ? he maneuvered between palm trees in the Congo and flew under the sights of air defense in Donetsk/Luhansk regions, evacuated the wounded dozens of times, dropped groups of paratroopers and SSOshniks ?at ground zero?, transported weapons... But the contract came to an end, ahead ? an interesting job in a private company and, finally, quiet time with his family. Mykhailo did make the flight at dawn on February 24. However, the route had to be changed a little. And after him - more than 200 flights. Of them, 132 were for fire damage to the enemy.
